Detailed Description

This class collects and manages a pool of particle system.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef vector<ParticleInfo*> UtilityParticleSet::particlesList

The pool is a array of UtilityParticleSet::ParticleInfo

typedef vector<ParticleInfo*>::const_iterator UtilityParticleSet::particlesList_it

Iterator over the psystems

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

float  effectDuration,
string  objectName,
string  effectName,
string  alternateEffectName = "" 
)

Parameters:
<poolSize> Size of the pool.
<objectName> The ogre's entity name.
<effectName> The resource effect name.
<alternateEffectName> Used for compose alternated effects.
<effectDuration> How much each psystem can run after it is started and before it is hided.

Member Function Documentation

void UtilityParticleSet::checkForExpiredPS (  ) 

This hide all the expired psystems.

A psystem is expired when currentTime > startTime + mEffectDuration

SceneNode* UtilityParticleSet::startNextPS ( Vector3  position  ) 

Show the next available psystem of the pool.

Parameters:
<position> The position where to place the psystem.
Returns:
The Ogre::SceneNode at which is attached the psystem.
